name: Bell and Dorje
shortDescription: The bell and dorje (Tibetan: drilbu and dorje; Sanskrit: ghanta and vajra) are paired ritual implements fundamental to Tibetan Buddhist practice....
fullDescription: The bell and dorje (Tibetan: drilbu and dorje; Sanskrit: ghanta and vajra) are paired ritual implements fundamental to Tibetan Buddhist practice. Used together in virtually all Tantric ceremonies, they represent the union of wisdom and compassion, the complementary aspects of enlightened consciousness that must be integrated for spiritual realization.
